name: Space Odyssey (itch) (Meru)
description:
This is just a very short demo and is around 2-3 minutes long that contains the first stage of this game.

This is a fan-made game of the original Space Impact in Nokia 3310.

I've always wanted to remake this game into how I imagined it when I was a kid, like the first group of enemies, I think they are asteroids back then, until now. 

I want it to look cartoony and keeping the original gameplay in it, also trying to make it a little bit of bullet hell-ish.
The sprites and images may change on the future post and updates.

Finally got my free time to learn how to use Unity. : )

Still need to add a few stages before releasing this game. If you have any suggestions to improve this game, I would love to know it!

Thanks!

Follow me on itch.io - merujian.itch.io
Follow me on Twitter - twitter.com/meruu27
